description:
Would you like get more clients, sales, subscribers and clicks from your own YouTube videos as well as other people's videos?

YouTube belongs to Google and is the number two most-used search engine after Google. This course will show you how to piggy-back and profit from this search engine power, at no cost to you.

I've discovered a little feature that has turned my YouTube channel into a massive marketing machine â€“ at no cost to me. And I can prove it with over 10,400 subscribers and 1.6 million views.

The result? More than 95% of my clients and opportunities come my way come from YouTube!

This course is for anyone who has a YouTube channel. Whether you're tubing for fun or business, this course is for those who want more subscribers and more clicks to external sites.

Want to build your eMail list? This is the way to do it!

Why? Because this little free tool allows you to do some really cool stuff. Here is what you will learn:

  • How to set up your YouTube videos so viewers can click straight through to your website directly from within your videos.
  • Do you want your logo to be clickable within the video? No problem! I'll show you how.
  • I'll show you how to utilize static YouTube videos to get subscribers and clicks to your website, including third party sites. This is especially true for those podcasts, teleseminars, radio shows or even printed articles.
  • I'll show you how to get subscribers to your YouTube channel even when people are watching your videos in full screen view.
  • What about using affiliate links within your video? No problem! If you have an affiliate product you want to market, I'll show you how to place your affiliate link directly into your YouTube video (not the notes area). I'll even show you how to turn ugly affiliate links into beautiful links that will get the click.

Watch Me Live! This course is taught with video software that allows you to watch over my shoulder as I show you step-by-step how to use this YouTube feature. No, you do not need to be technical to be able to do this. All you need is a partner YouTube account.

*************************************************************************************

Note: This is a new course and the price you are seeing is a super low introductory rate. This rate will increase by $10 each week until the course has reached its final rate. Once you're in, you will have life time access to any new material, even if the course price increases. Want to get in and join now? Make that click.

*************************************************************************************
title: YouTube Annotations & Cards: Get Subscribers, Sales & Income
